description:
A modern outdoor classic, the plushy softness of a Synchilla fleece is a welcome layer of warmth on a cool morning or at a shady campsite. It has Patagonia's signature Snap-T styling: chest pocket with a snapped nylon flap and a stand-up collar to top the 4-snap placket. Contrast spandex binding at sleeve openings and hem helps hold in warmth.

  • Double-faced recycled polyester fleece is soft, warm and lightweight
  • Stand-up collar guards against gusts of wind
  • Nylon placket has four snaps for versatile venting
  • Chest pocket with nylon flap and snap closure
  • Spandex trim on hem and cuffs helps keep out the cold
  • Sewn-in name tag has multiple spaces to accommodate hand-me-downs
name: Patagonia Lightweight Synchilla Snap-T Pullover - Infants to Youths
